meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Amy Carruthers Matt Campanaro Tom Massimo Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4386.

div.div: Game data retrieved from an alternate archive.

td.p: Amy Carruthers, a homemaker from Culver, South Carolina
Matt Campanaro, an environmental scientist from Knoxville, Tennessee
Tom Massimo, an equity trader from New York, New York

tr.td: THE ANIMAL KINGDOM
DECORATING
COUNTRY SONGS
NATIONAL HISTORIC PARKS
PAINTINGS
ADD A LETTER
